name: Super VaGu
description:
An Arcade Gameboy styled game made in about 3 days for ScoreSpace Game Jame.

"VaGu" (short for vacuum guy), an alien stuck on an unknown planet, he wanna get out of there but he cannot fly!
He finds out that he can inhale the fruity clouds and absorb their energy to get a jump boost.
Help VaGu to escape in this game while competing for the leaderboards at the same time!

Controls:
Use arrow keys or WASD to move sideways
Use the mouse cursor to look around and hold left mouse button to inhale

It is recommended to play on full screen.

This game is made with Godot Game Engine
Leaderboards powered by Lootlocker.io
Sound effects made using SFXR 

All the Sprites, Sound Effects, Code, etc by me EXCEPT:
BG Music - Cauliflower by Zane Little Music
BG Image - Retro game boy themed City by Cosmixian
